channel.title: Little Bug i have in my server * Help
channel.description:
Ok so, when i opened the server.exe or moparscape.exe it loaded, and i logged in now, i tryed to register my server IP, and name onto the moparscape server status and when ever i do that, it says offline.
Also if i leave it at 127.00.01 or whatever, will it put FlashScape.no-ip.org? or something? cause, that's what i want it to do.
Help Post below please and thnks.

item.title: Little Bug i have in my server * Help
item.dc:creator: @Public_Void Public Void
item.description:
@Public_Void wrote:

If you want to use No-Ip you need to port forward. If you want to know how contact your router company and “Live Chat” with them and ask then how to. Or find a tutorial on Moparscape Forums and follow that.

Hope I helped,
-Tyler

Read full topic
item.source: Little Bug i have in my server * Help
